description: Billy Murray is holding a whiskey glass up, Ribisi is distracted, and Johansson is stuck in limbo, singing karaoke. More of a mood mode, same as this whole series. Plug in your earphones and stare out the train window, yeah?
title: Desperately Seeking: Sofia Coppola in the New Millenium – Lost in Translation

movies.title: Desperately Seeking: Sofia Coppola in the New Millenium – Lost in Translation

description: “Guys we need to talk…… at the next LA Loft at Braindead! LA Loft Movie Club is a film festival where participants and audiences get together to talk, enjoy food and drinks, and watch a program of one minute films they’ve created together. Our November screening “we need to talk” will explore every possible interpretation of those words across a variety of mediums. The festival is open to everyone— come by to see exactly what it is that we need to talk about!”
title: LA Loft Movie Club + NEWS FROM HOME

movies.title: LA Loft Movie Club + NEWS FROM HOME

description: David Farrier unveils a truly unhinged web that starts with op-shops and car clamping and then unravels into a whole mess of lies and sosciopathy. A very Errol Morris/ Louis Theroux unfolding of the social dynamic, but it’s NZ, so basically set on the high street and in someone’s flat. Cottage investigation, if you will!
title: Mister Organ
